thread.title: DialogTech to Present on Call Tracking Strategy for Mobile Paid Search at SMX East 2015
thread.title_full: DialogTech to Present on Call Tracking Strategy for Mobile Paid Search at SMX East 2015

author: admin
title: DialogTech to Present on Call Tracking Strategy for Mobile Paid Search at SMX East 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 3:01 AM Companies mentioned in this article: DialogTech 
CHICAGO, IL -- (Marketwired) -- 09/28/15 -- DialogTech , the market leader in call analytics and automation for the enterprise and agencies, today announced its presence at SMX East , the world's largest search engine marketing conference and expo. Hosted by Search Engine Journal, this event will take place Sept. 29 - Oct. 1 at the Jacob Javits Convention Center in New York, NY. At the show, DialogTech's Product Marketing Manager, Jon Byrd, will present a session discussing the significance of call tracking strategy for mobile paid search. 
DialogTech Presentation At-A-Glance 
Presentation: "New Call Tracking Strategies for Mobile Paid Search that Really Work" Who: Jon Byrd, product marketing manager, DialogTech What: Mobile paid search will generate 50 billion calls this year. Are you ready? Join call tracking experts from DialogTech to learn the latest proven strategies around driving quality call conversions and revenue from mobile paid search. When: Tuesday, September 29, 2015 from 3:20 p.m. - 3:40 p.m. ET Where: SMX East Theater A 
DialogTech is re-architecting the way companies can attribute and enhance phone leads by delivering a solution that offers a powerful, extensive and flexible platform to optimize the entire sales funnel. Due to the pervasiveness of smartphones, DialogTech's Voice360Â™ platform is a unique suite of applications to control, measure and optimize the impact of phone calls throughout every stage of the customer lifecycle -- from discovery to purchase to retention, eliminating critical blind spots for CMOs. 
Attending SMX East 2015? Come see DialogTech in the Expo Hall at booth #444 and attend Jon Byrd's speaking session titled, "New Call Tracking Strategies for Mobile Paid Search that Really Work", for a chance to win a $100 American Express gift card. 
Tweet this: . @DialogTech presents call tracking strategy for #mobile paid search @ #SMX East Sept. 29-Oct. 1 in NYC
